title: You look good in that script

speakers.title: On CoffeeScript
speakers.name: Derek Brans
speakers.synopsis: CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript. Underneath all of those embarrassing braces and semicolons, JavaScript has always had a gorgeous object model at its heart. CoffeeScript is an attempt to expose the good parts of JavaScript in a simple way.  Derek's also going to talk about the IDE he's working on - built for CoffeeScript, in CoffeeScript on top of nodejs.

speakers.title: Two Prototypal Eureka Moments
speakers.name: Laurent Villeneuve
speakers.synopsis: Flash presentation about Laurent's new script, Super.js - a micro sized JS class implementation.
